| History                 = The Shadow Consortium were a cabal dedicated to ruling the world and then the [[Sol|solar system]]. To this end, they made an alliance with the [[Aakon]], but the Aakon betrayed them. The Aakon planned to wipe out Earth with a Death Storm. [[Robert Rider (Earth-9442)|Nova 0:0]] who came from an [[Earth-9442|alternate timeline]] where the Death Storm wiped out his world died saving the [[Earth-616|616-Earth]] from the storm.{{r|Nova Vol 2 8|16}}
